title: 10$ RP Christmas Giveaway :D
body:
EDIT - This contest is now done!! I sifted through the posts and entered the valid ones in a random number generator. The winner is 

xfcbot - Trees, Livid, French

I have some leftover RP on my account so I figured I'd generate a second number and gift someone a mystery skin as well. That winner is - 

Lathanwalker - Giraffe, Prunes, Marbles

Thank you guys for participating and happy holidays to everyone!!

Hey all,

I saved one of my 10$ Christmas RP gift cards for you guys this year :D

All you have to do is type three words that don't make a complete sentence (example Cherry, Movement, Spain) and upvote this thread. I'll check back tomorrow morning and if this thread has 50 upvotes, I'll choose somebody at random, add them as friend, and PM them the code in client. Merry Christmas you guys!

Off to do Christmas things {{summoner:12}}

replies.body: Holy fucking shit I actually know the first word... it's actually a rather common lung disease cause by breathing in microscopic silica shards. Although it's commonly misdiagnosed as mesothelioma due to VERY similar symptoms.   Most common in Cuba, the Philippines, and Vietnam... I knew Med School would be good for something!!! MOM!! DON'T GIVE UP ON ME YET!!! I HAVE POTENTIAL, AND DAD'LL LOVE ME AGAIN!!
Thanks brother (or sister). Happy holidays to you and yours.

john cena....
john sona...
sona = renekton (read comic) http://pre05.deviantart.net/d991/th/pre/f/2012/230/0/5/lol__the_masculine_sona___part_1_by_phsueh-d5bhw04.jpg


john cena = renekton

INCASE YOU WILL DENY THAT TAKE THIS INTO CONSIDERATION:
Turd
Poop
Shit

Respite, Overpowered, Nerf

Thank you so much for giving people such a chance. Coming across players like you always makes my day and reminds me that no matter how many flamers, feeders or haters there are out there, there are still amazing people! So good job!

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}} 

I do have a question tho; is the giveaway only for NA people? Because I am in EUNE. Either way, I really appreciate your thought. Keep up the good work!

Anyone who has posted in this thread has a chance. I've spent an hour last night sifting through the posts that follow the rules, and am almost finished with the rest this morning. They'll be put in a random number generator and I'll post the winner in a few minutes here.

[This dude's for real.](http://prntscr.com/9ix8re)

Thank you so much for the RP, I'm off to go buy a lottery ticket because I'm pretty lucky today cx
